title: Roast leg of lamb with beans
ingredients: ['250 g (8½ oz) dried flageolet beans, soaked overnight in cold water', '4 large garlic cloves, peeled', '1 bay leaf', '900 g (2 lb) boneless lean leg of lamb, trimmed of fat', '4 small sprigs of fresh rosemary', '½ lemon, thinly sliced', '3 tsp olive oil', '675 g (1½ lb) floury potatoes, peeled and cut into 2.5 cm (1 in) cubes', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '4 tomatoes, diced', '4 tbsp chopped parsley', '450 g (1 lb) green beans', '4 tbsp red wine', '300 ml (10 fl oz) lamb or beef stock, preferably home-made', 'salt and pepper']
